ocean.question: I am big and blue and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I am very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You can find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squirt ink when I'm scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live deep in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.
🌊 I swim in the ocean and have fins.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and loves to jump and play. I am very smart. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make clicking sounds to talk.
⚽ I like to play with balls.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. I am often small and bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I live in a reef with other fish.

ocean.question: I am very big and have baleen plates instead of teeth. I sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a very large animal.
🎶 I make sounds in the water.
🦐 I eat tiny creatures in the ocean.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. I walk sideways on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I live near the ocean, sometimes under rocks.

ocean.question: I am a type of plant that grows in the ocean. Fish like to hide in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐡 Fish and other animals hide in me for protection.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with a hard, spiky body. I can regenerate my arms if I lose one. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have many arms, but I am not an octopus.
💪 If I lose a part, I can grow it back!
🌟 I am shaped like a star, but I am not in the sky.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I can be part of a salad.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with leaves and a trunk. Birds build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves can change colors in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell nice. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me in a salad or as a pickle. What am I?
I am a fruit with a stem and seeds. You can eat me red or green. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple a day keeps the doctor away!
🥧 You can make pie with me.
🐛 A worm lives in me in a story.

plant.question: I have sharp points, but I am green all year round. I am often decorated for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 I am a type of tree.

plant.question: I grow underground and have a brown skin, but I am white or yellow inside. You can make french fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I can be mashed or fried.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Squirrels love to hide me for the winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I fall from trees in the fall.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk and golden seeds. You can pop me to make a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You eat me at the movies.

plant.question: I am a big, round, orange fruit that grows on a vine. People carve me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 You make a jack-o-lantern out of me.
👻 I am used for a spooky holiday
